question: List all employees and the names of the projects they are assigned to.
mysql_example: SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name, p.project_name FROM employees e JOIN employee_projects ep ON e.id = ep.employee_id JOIN projects p ON ep.project_id = p.id;
sqlite_example: SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name, p.project_name FROM employees e JOIN employee_projects ep ON e.id = ep.employee_id JOIN projects p ON ep.project_id = p.id;
